channel.title: Examples on Cdev | Dynamic Serverless Framework
channel.description: Recent content in Examples on Cdev | Dynamic Serverless Framework

item.title: HTTP API endpoints
item.description: Build an HTTP API Endpoint HTTP endpoints have become one of the most ubiquitous ways of delivering software to end users. Cdev provides a simple interface for creating HTTP Apis on the cloud and connecting them to serverless functions. Create an Api from cdev.resources.simple.api import Api myApi = Api("demoApi") Create routes from cdev.resources.simple.api import Api, route_verb myApi = Api("demoApi") hello_world_get_route = myApi.route("/hello_world", route_verb.GET) Integrate GET route with a Serverless function import json from cdev.

item.title: Integrate with Dynamodb
item.description: Integrating with Dynamodb Most applications will need a database for storing persistent data, and Dynamodb is the flagship aws nosql database. It is the easiest to get setup and integrated with serverless functions. For more information about how use the database effectively visit the aws documentation. Create a Dynamodb table for storing emails from cdev.resources.simple.table import Table, key_type, attribute_type MyAttributes = [ {"AttributeName": "email", "AttributeType": attribute_type.S}, {"AttributeName": "date_created", "AttributeType": attribute_type.
